OUR STORY
It all started when our founders, Arsen and Viktoria decided to surprise their family with an RV trip. Arsen and Viktoria rented a C-Class RV and drove themselves and their family on a road trip through the state of New York. After the trip, the husband and wife duo knew what needed to be done: "We have to get our own."
​
After acquiring their first trailer they began to travel far, all the way up to Massachussets and down to the Florida Keys! Arsen and Viktoria saw the joy and life long lasting memories they were creating with their family and wanted to be able to provide that experience to others. Thus, Glampers Camp was born.
Giving Back
Our Mission
Its Simple:
Spread positivity. Create memories. Enjoy the Great Outdoors.​
​
We know how much a vacation can change the dynamic of a family, or even help bring some much needed peace and relaxation. That is why we are working around the clock to make sure that we can provide you with the most luxurious, fun, nature filled RV rentals as we can. From the color of the linens to the exact leveling of the campers, we pay attention to the small details and that is what we pride ourselves on.

Need Help?
CONTACT  US
Book Your Trip in 3 Easy Steps
01
Reserve Your RV
Book any of our Glamping Rentals. Book right online or give us a call at 862-243-2777. Choose from a variety of rentals from all different sizes, amenities, locations etc. All bedding, utensils, linens, and well, the RV are all provided.
02
Plan Your Trip
Prepare your bags cause you are going on vacation! Get ready to take a drive or maybe even a flight! Want to rent a golf cart, a kayak, or maybe even fishing gear? Be sure to give us a call so you're prepared for all the adventures near and around our locations! Don't forget your toothbrush.
03
Hit the Road
Get to Glampers Camp and start your luxury camping experience, or like we like to say, get ready to go Glamping! At check-in, a member of our staff will welcome you to your site and provide a tour of your RV.
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Book Your Glamper Today!
Book Now
What People Say About Us
"We had such a great time. The RV was clean and had everything we needed for a great long weekend. The lake was beautiful and there were kayaks and boats for us to use. There were great hiking trails steps from the RV. The RV was right on the water so you walk right out to amazing views. We will be back and will bring family and friends."
Patrick Chester
View More Reviews
